member.name: SSL_F12_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS
member.summary: The SSL_F12_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS structure checks if any certificates in the chain have weak cryptography and checks if a third party root certificate is compliant with the Microsoft Root Program requirements. An error string will be provided if either condition is not met.

member.name: SSL_F12_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS.cbSize
member.summary: DWORD value that specifies the size, in bytes, of this structure. This value must be set to a value greater than or equal to sizeof(SSL_F12_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS).

summary.para: DWORD value that specifies the level of an error.
DWORD value that specifies the category of an error. Each error category has a corresponding dwErrorLevel.

listheader.description:
Errors in this category with the dwErrorLevel: CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_SSL_F12_WARNING_LEVEL are errors associated with all other roots including enterprise.
Errors in this category with the dwErrorLevel: CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_SSL_F12_ERROR_LEVEL are errors associated with the third party root certificate.
Errors in this category with the dwErrorLevel: CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_SSL_F12_WARNING_LEVEL are all errors with root program compliance failures.

member.name: SSL_F12_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS.dwReserved
member.summary: DWORD value reserved for future use.

member.name: SSL_F12_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS.wszErrorText
member.summary: The error string provided if any certificates in the chain have weak cryptography or if the third party root certificate is not compliant with the Microsoft Root Program requirements.
